intent.para: Intent Convert the interface of a class into another interface clients expect.Adapter lets classes work together that couldn't otherwise because of incompatible interfaces.

motivation.para: Sometimes a toolkit or class library cannot be used because its interface is incompatible with the interface required by an application
We cannot change the library interface
Even if we did have the source code, we should not change the library

applicability.para: Use the Adapter pattern when: You want to use an existing class that performs similar functions but with a different interface.
